name: AVAudioSession.CategoryOptions
desc: Constants that specify optional audio behaviors.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the raw value you specify.

items.name: static var mixWithOthers: AVAudioSession.CategoryOptions
items.desc: An option that indicates whether audio from this session mixes with audio from active sessions in other audio apps.

items.name: static var duckOthers: AVAudioSession.CategoryOptions
items.desc: An option that reduces the volume of other audio sessions while audio from this session plays.

items.name: static var interruptSpokenAudioAndMixWithOthers: AVAudioSession.CategoryOptions
items.desc: An option that determines whether to pause spoken audio content from other sessions when your app plays its audio.

items.name: static var allowBluetooth: AVAudioSession.CategoryOptions
items.desc: An option that determines whether Bluetooth hands-free devices appear as available input routes.

items.name: static var allowBluetoothA2DP: AVAudioSession.CategoryOptions
items.desc: An option that determines whether you can stream audio from this session to Bluetooth devices that support the Advanced Audio Distribution Profile (A2DP).

items.name: static var allowAirPlay: AVAudioSession.CategoryOptions
items.desc: An option that determines whether you can stream audio from this session to AirPlay devices.

items.name: static var defaultToSpeaker: AVAudioSession.CategoryOptions
items.desc: An option that determines whether audio from the session defaults to the built-in speaker instead of the receiver.

items.name: static var overrideMutedMicrophoneInterruption: AVAudioSession.CategoryOptions
items.desc: An option that indicates whether the system interrupts the audio session when it mutes the built-in microphone.
